favorites.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
favorites.author: Steve Jobs

favorites.content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
favorites.author: Dalai Lama

favorites.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
favorites.author: Walt Disney

favorites.content: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
favorites.author: Mark Twain
